full_text:
Re: Suicide Watch Institutional Supplement
From
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
To
James Petrucci
Date
2019/08/22 15:36
Subject:
Re: Suicide Watch Institutional Supplement
Attachments:
TEXT.htm
Thank you. I have forwarded the request to them.
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Psy.D.
Chief Psychologist
U.S. Department of Justice/
Federal Bureau of Prisons
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: (646) 836-(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Fax: (646) 836-7712
E-mail (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
>>> James Petrucci 8/22/2019 3:11 PM >>>
You need to get with Captain (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) and Lt. (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) for these documents. Thanks.
>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 8/22/2019 1:32 PM >>>
A couple of days ago (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) requested documents and I forwarded it to you in an e-mail (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) is for the suicide post orders (general orders) for suicide watch. He also asked for the sign-in sheets for staff who were sitting on Epstein during his suicide watch. Do we have a copy of this in the Lieutenant's office as well as the post orders? If there are not specific post orders, I think we should get a copy of the quarterly post orders to demonstrate that the officers who sat on inmate Epstein signed for the quarter.
Were these ever obtained by the Captain as I want to forward them. Thanks!
(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Psy.D.
Chief Psychologist
U.S. Department of Justice/
Federal Bureau of Prisons
Metropolitan Correctional Center
150 Park Row
New York, New York 10007
Office: (646) 83(b)(6); (b)(7)(C)
Fax: (646) 836-7712
E-mail (b)(6); (b)(7)(C)@bop.gov
>>> (b)(6); (b)(7)(C) 20/2019 11:40 AM >>>
